articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Malta court overturns German captain's migrant conviction
articles.description: A Maltese appeals court has overturned a conviction of a German captain of a private ship that rescues migrants in the Mediterranean Sea
articles.content:
VALLETTA, Malta -- 
A Maltese appeals court on Tuesday overturned the conviction against the German captain of a private ship that rescues migrants in the Mediterranean Sea.
Claus Peter Reisch had been found guilty in May of not having the ship registration… [+453 chars]

articles.author: CIARAN GILES and BARRY HATTON Associated Press
articles.title: Spain: Just two votes may end protracted political stalemate
articles.description: Spain’s parliament is poised to give its blessing to the formation of a Socialist-led coalition government, ending almost a year of political limbo for the eurozone’s fourth-largest economy
articles.content:
MADRID -- 
Spanish lawmakers are due to vote Tuesday on whether to endorse the formation of a Socialist-led coalition government, ending almost a year of political limbo for the eurozones fourth-largest economy.
Parliament must decide whether to give its bl… [+2481 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Iran state TV says 35 killed, 48 injured in stampede that erupted at funeral procession for general slain in US strike
articles.description: Iran state TV says 35 killed, 48 injured in stampede that erupted at funeral procession for general slain in US strike
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
Iran state TV says 35 killed, 48 injured in stampede that erupted at funeral procession for general slain in US strike.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Iran state TV says a stampede erupts at funeral procession for general slain in US airstrike, killing some mourners
articles.description: Iran state TV says a stampede erupts at funeral procession for general slain in US airstrike, killing some mourners
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
Iran state TV says a stampede erupts at funeral procession for general slain in US airstrike, killing some mourners.

articles.author: Mark Hanrahan
articles.title: 6.5 earthquake hits Puerto Rico
articles.description: A magnitude 6.5 earthquake struck Puerto Rico in the early hours of Tuesday, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
articles.content:
A magnitude 6.5 earthquake struck Puerto Rico in the early hours of Tuesday, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
The quake hit close to the town of Tallaboa on the island's south coast, at 4:24 a.m. local time (03:24a.m EST) at a depth of 10 kilometers,… [+710 chars]

articles.author: ADIL JAWAD Associated Press
articles.title: Pakistani writer says his novel on ex-dictator confiscated
articles.description: A prominent Pakistani novelist and New York Times columnist says security agents raided the offices of his publisher and confiscated all the copies of his book about the country's former military dictator Ziaul Haq
articles.content:
KARACHI, Pakistan -- 
A prominent Pakistani novelist and New York Times columnist said on Tuesday that security agents raided the offices of his publisher and confiscated all the copies of his book about the country's former military dictator Ziaul Haq.
The… [+2380 chars]

articles.author: DANICA COTO Associated Press
articles.title: 6.5 quake strikes Puerto Rico amid heavy seismic activity
articles.description: A 6.5-magnitude earthquake has struck Puerto Rico. It is the largest in a series of quakes that have struck the U.S. territory in recent days and caused heavy damage in some areas
articles.content:
SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico -- 
A 6.5-magnitude earthquake struck Puerto Rico before dawn on Tuesday, the largest in a series of quakes that have struck the U.S. territory in recent days and caused heavy damage in some areas.
A tsunami alert was initially issued … [+1703 chars]
